hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 74 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
perturb let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation but herb sometimes you are
disturbed by something that is told to
you or you are simply worried about
something the word perturb asically
means to be disturbed or to worry about
something constantly when you are
perturbed you are very much worried
about something that has happened or
will happen in the near future so when
you are anxious due to something that
has happened you are perturbed you get
agitated or are in a confused state of
mind you actually feel very upset about
something for example your friends
ill-health perturbs you that means you
are worried about the situation your
friend is in and that upsets you very
much
perturb is also an astronomical
terminology as the word perturb shows
the action of disturbing or being upset
it is a verb okay now that you know what
perturb means let's take a look at some
example sentences to see how you can use
it in your daily conversation
example one the rumors of the riot
spread like a wildfire and perturbed the
smooth order of the town leaving the
streets deserted example to the mother
was really perturbed when she found a
pack of cigarettes in her daughter's
bedroom example 3 William was perturbed
after he observed Mary's lack of
interest in continuing their
relationship as he couldn't figure out
the reason for their breakup example for
the extortion calls received by Peter
had perturbed him he finally decided to
report the matter to the police example
5 the warning of the expected hurry can
perturb the people as they had to
evacuate the city of their earliest to
the nearest safety camp example 6
Andy was perturbed to get a huge cut in
her salary even though she achieved her
sales targets for the month
example 7 Harry's rude and disruptive
behavior after being drunk of the picnic
perturbed his wife
example eight Samantha told her friend
my obesity issued perturbs me and I lack
confidence in whatever I do example nine
little Shawn was indifferent to his
mother's warnings and nothing seemed to
perturb him
example 10 susan was perturbed by the
news that her father was terminally ill
she immediately flew down to be with him
that's the end of today's episode when
